revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=widemac |model=SL-R6801 |revision=(XDX-RN502H) |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/18/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability= |type=travel router |fcc_id=ZNPWIDEMAC |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050F |cpu1_cspeed=320 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320EBTI-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6JH-6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=schematics |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N150 AP Router}} :[https://web.archive.org/web/20160806134812/http://sztianhao.com/prodetial.php?id=130 Product page] (WD-R6801)
"XDX-RN502H V2.0" and "0921" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/ZNPWIDEMAC/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photo-1503119 board].
The manufacturer of this device appears to be '''widemac''' :[http://sztianhao.com Shenzhen Century Xinyang Technology Co., Ltd]
===Models product=== *[https://web.archive.org/web/20160806142603/http://sztianhao.com/products.php?id=185 N150 Routers] â€¢ [https://web.archive.org/web/20160806142915/http://sztianhao.com/products.php?id=184 N300 Routers] *[https://fccid.io/ZNPWIDEMAC/Letter/Authorization-Letter-1503116 Model No.]: SL-R6801, SL-R6802, SL-R7201, SL-R7202, SL-R7203, :SL-R7204, SL-R7205, SL-R7206, SL-R7207, TK-R6801, TK-R7202, :SAI-BCS-104, SAI-BC-B209, SAI-SCS-103
===Additional external links=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=36463 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=297480#p297480 ''3G Router - RT3050F'' (XDX-RN502H V7.0)]
